document.full_text: in their first full week of performances since opening on broadway, the new musical "priscilla queen of the desert" notched a 30 percent increase in ticket sales and the revival of "arcadia" was up 20 percent compared to their box-office grosses the prior week.
document.title: they love the nightlife: audiences flock to 'priscilla queen of the desert'
lines_and_colors: in their first full week of performances since opening on broadway, the new musical "priscilla queen of the desert" notched a 30 percent increase in ticket sales and the revival of "arcadia" was up 20 percent compared to their box-office grosses the prior week.
